summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Video Voice Description Generator app. Backend APIs are fully functional with successful video upload, scene detection, AI description generation, and database operations. Frontend UI is working well with proper navigation, scene editing, and thumbnail display. Minor issues found with audio playback and navigation.

minor_issues.issue: Audio files return 404 when accessed via browser, causing audio playback to fail
minor_issues.impact: Users cannot play generated audio descriptions

ui_bugs.issue: Back button does not successfully navigate to homepage

integration_issues.issue: Audio files fail to load with 'no supported source found' error

passed_tests: Video upload API endpoint working correctly
Scene detection and AI analysis completing successfully
Project and scene data retrieval from database
Scene description editing and saving functionality
Editor page loading with project details
Scene cards displaying with thumbnails and descriptions
All backend CRUD operations for projects and scenes

success_percentage.backend: 95% - All core APIs working, minor audio serving issue
success_percentage.frontend: 90% - UI functional, minor navigation and audio playback issues

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix audio file serving endpoint to properly serve MP3 files with correct MIME types. Investigate back button navigation issue in React Router. Both are minor issues that don't affect core functionality.
